newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria cenbank offers one-day tender at 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Austria cenbank offers one-day tender at 3 pct.

text.p: The Austrian central bank said on Thursday it was offering one-day securities repurchase agreements at a fixed rate of three percent.
Bids have to be in at 10 a.m. (0900 GMT) on Thursday, it said.
The central bank said the quick tender was aimed at satisfying the extra demand for liquidity expected this weekend when the pre-Christmas shopping season gets under way.
Funds will be credited to banks' accounts on Thursday and will have to be returned on Friday.
The bank said the one-day repos would be in addition to its regular weekly offer of seven-day repurchase agreements, which is usually announced on Thursdays.
